channel.title: Synthing for Mac OS X Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Added some items to the menu
item.description:
• Add items to menu
    • Pause All Devices/Resume All Devices
    • Rescan All For a complete list of changes compared to previous release see https://github.com/xor-gate/syncthing-macosx/compare/v0.14.33-1…v0.14.46-1

item.title: Long time no see
item.description: Release notes: Application bundle now signed by @virusman with Developer ID Application: Victor Babenko (JUW2CNK88G) * Improvements * Update the status icon when Syncthing is synchronising #29 * Update syncthing executable to v0.14.33 #35 * Read config.xml on first start #36 * Don’t open web browser on start of syncthing (-no-browser argument) * Automate application bundle signing #34 * Bugfixes * Unable to Copy-paste of API key input box with cmd+v in configuration window #20 * Cannot toggle “start at login” #25

item.title: Fix problem while not loading the preferences window
item.description: The preferences window was not loading because StartAtLogin default was not written. Which resulted in an assertion when setting Nil string in the window. - See issue #16 for more details

item.title: Bugfix release on v0.14.8
item.description:
NOTE: It seems this release fails to open the preferences window when installing on a virgin machine

Fixes #13 - Doesn’t run syncthing executable in background at startup.

item.title: Fixes for auto-updater
item.description:
• Fixes
    • Don’t check for updates on application start directly
    • Bundle now has correct version for use with auto-updates
  • UI
    • About window now has a check for updates button

item.title: UI bugfix release
item.description: This release ships some UI bugfixes from @virusman. It still ships syncthing 0.14.3.
